projects.title: Justice Transcribe
projects.description: National Ai service automating probation meeting documentation using Ai transcription and LLM-generated summaries. Scaled from 300-user pilot to 40,000 probation officers nationwide.
achievements: Delivered 34,000+ transcriptions and summaries by Nov 2025
Scaled from pilot to national rollout for 40,000 officers
Added automated tests, coverage reporting, and secure CI/CD
projects.learnings: Scaling Ai services in government requires robust engineering practices, user-centered design, and transparent communication about Ai capabilities and limitations.

projects.title: Ai Email Agent
projects.description: 3-month tech spike proof-of-concept: an agentic Microsoft Outlook automation system that orchestrates inbox management, applies user-defined policies, drafts responses, and integrates with Microsoft Entra SSO.
achievements: Integrated Microsoft Entra SSO via MSAL
Built email policy orchestration engine with LLM agents
Automated inbox triage and response drafting
projects.learnings: Microsoft Graph API integration requires careful handling of authentication tokens and rate limits. Agentic systems need clear guardrails and user oversight to build trust.

projects.title: MoJ GitHub Chat
projects.description: Prototype semantic search tool for exploring organisation repositories using RAG (Retrieval-Augmented Generation) and agentic orchestration. Helps developers discover relevant code and documentation.
achievements: Implemented RAG architecture with vector embeddings
projects.learnings: RAG systems are powerful for code search but require careful chunking strategies and context window management. Shiny provides rapid prototyping for data-driven applications.

projects.title: Daemon Ai Assistant
projects.description: Prototype autonomous reviewer for document analysis using modern web technologies. Built with Vercel v0 for rapid UI iteration and FastAPI backend for LLM integration.
achievements: Modern Next.js frontend with responsive design
FastAPI backend with structured LLM outputs
projects.learnings: Vercel v0 dramatically accelerates UI development. Combining Next.js frontend with FastAPI backend provides excellent developer experience and deployment flexibility.

projects.title: Langfuse Observability Platform
projects.description: Self-hosted Langfuse instance in Azure supporting monitoring and evaluation of all LLM completions across the directorate. Comprehensive infrastructure-as-code deployment with automated SSL and DNS.
achievements: Deployed using Terraform and Helm with full IaC
Automated SSL with cert-manager + Let's Encrypt
projects.learnings: Kubernetes deployments require careful attention to networking, secrets management, and SSL automation. Observability infrastructure needs to be as reliable as the services it monitors.

projects.title: Ai News Crawler
projects.description: Ai-powered prototype news crawler using LangChain and the DuckDuckGo MCP server to ingest relevant articles into ChromaDB for RAG-based semantic search.
achievements: Integrated MCP server for web search
ChromaDB vector storage for semantic search
projects.learnings: MCP (Model Context Protocol) provides interesting abstractions for tool use. Web scraping requires robust error handling and rate limiting to be production-ready.

projects.title: Choose Your Own Adventure
projects.description: Interactive choose-your-own-adventure game powered by GPT-3.5 Turbo. Developed before structured output endpoints were available, demonstrating early LLM integration patterns with content safety via OpenAI's moderation endpoint.
achievements: Deployed public demo with Python Shiny
projects.learnings: Early LLM applications required creative prompt engineering to achieve structured outputs. Content moderation is essential for user-facing generative AI applications.

projects.title: User Personas Generator
projects.tagline: Rapid persona and requirements generation tool
projects.description: Tool for rapidly generating user personas and project requirements through conversational AI. Features concurrent chat stream management for exploring needs and requirements within provided project contexts.
projects.learnings: Concurrent stream management in Python Shiny requires careful state handling. LLMs excel at structured persona generation when given appropriate context.

projects.title: PyROSM Cities Explorer
projects.description: Fast exploration of OpenStreetMap spatial features across international urban areas using PyROSM. Developed as an onboarding tool for graduate data scientists transitioning to geospatial work at ONS Data Science Campus. Note: OSM is crowd-sourced data with varying accuracy by area.
achievements: Integrated PyROSM for efficient OSM parsing
Deployed educational tool for DSC onboarding
projects.learnings: PyROSM provides efficient parsing of OSM data. Educational tools benefit from interactive exploration over static tutorials.

projects.title: UnifyR Join Demonstrator
projects.description: Educational tool demonstrating dplyr join types with interactive input/output dataframe visualization. Developed as a learning aid for the Reproducible Analytical Pipelines training programme, helping CARICOM analysts transition to programmatic data analysis.
projects.learnings: Visual demonstrations of data transformations significantly improve learning outcomes. Interactive tools help analysts transition from GUI-based to code-based workflows.

projects.title: UK COVID Mobility Tracker
projects.description: Interactive time series visualization of Google Mobility data by UK region, local authority, and clinical commissioning group. Urgent response tool developed at onset of ONS Data Science Campus employment to provide insight on movement patterns during COVID-19 outbreak and government containment measures.
achievements: Interactive time series with policy annotations
projects.learnings: Crisis response requires rapid development and deployment. Clear visualizations of complex data support evidence-based policy decisions.

projects.title: Wales Schools Finance Explorer
projects.tagline: Educational budget analysis and outlier detection
projects.description: Educational budget analysis tool developed for Wales Audit Office financial audits. Features novel scatter visualizations showing relationships between student enrollment and various budget categories, revealing clear correlations by school phase and size for outlier identification.
achievements: Enabled subject matter expert self-service analysis
Deployed outlier detection for audit workflows
projects.learnings: Domain expert self-service tools accelerate analysis workflows. Visual outlier detection is more effective than tabular reporting for audit work.
